content: धुरीण, धुरीय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धुरं वहति, अर्हति वा, धुर् ख छ बा] {@--1@} Able to bear or carry a burden. {@--2@} Fit to be harnessed. {@--3@} Charged with important duties. --णः, --यः {@--1@} A beast of burden. {@--2@} A man of business, or one charged with important duties. {@--3@} A chief, head, leader.
